Leverage an open source spectral analysis tool in your work.

Simple

Utilize PySAT through either an API for pipeline use or a single, integrated, GUI.

How PySAT works →

Open Source

Free and open source, written in Python, with code hosted via github.

Source Code →

Multi-Format

Currently supporting M3, MI, and SP with additional imagers to be added.

View supported imagers →
